headline: The Clorox Company (CLX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Clorox Company (CLX) on Substack by Business Model Mastery. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CLX. The Clorox Company (CLX)’s share was trading at $136.80 as of April 16th. CLX’s trailing and forward P/E were 37.28 and 18.52 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Clorox stands […]
